     5  
     6  // Package parlnet provides IP-related functions with few dependencies beyond the net package
     7  package parlnet
     8  
     9  import (
    10  	"net"
    11  	"strconv"
    12  	"strings"
    13  )
    14  
    15  const (
    16  	// DefaultRouteIPv4 is the default route 0/0 for IPv4
    17  	DefaultRouteIPv4 = "0.0.0.0/0"
    18  	// VPNRoute0IPv4 is overriding VPN route 0/1 for IPv4
    19  	VPNRoute0IPv4 = "0.0.0.0/1"
    20  	// VPNRoute128IPv4 is overriding VPN route 128/1 for IPv4
    21  	VPNRoute128IPv4 = "128.0.0.0/1"
    22  	// DefaultRouteIPv6 is the default route ::/0 for IPv6
    23  	DefaultRouteIPv6 = "::/0"
    24  	// VPNRouteIPv6 is overriding VPN route ::/3 for IPv6
    25  	VPNRouteIPv6 = "::/3"
    26  	zeroSuffix   = ".0"
    27  )
    28  
    29  // IsNetwork determines if IP is the network address (all zeros) for this Mask
    30  // for 1.2.3.4/24 the network address 1.2.3.0 returns true
    31  func IsNetwork(IP net.IP, IPMask net.IPMask) (isNetwork bool) {
    32  	if len(IP) != net.IPv4len && len(IP) != net.IPv6len {
    33  		return
    34  	}
    35  	isNetwork = IsZeros(IP.Mask(InvertMask(IPMask)))
    36  	return
    37  }
    38  
    39  // IsZeros determines if every byte of the IP address is zero
    40  func IsZeros(p net.IP) bool {
    41  	for i := 0; i < len(p); i++ {
    42  		if p[i] != 0 {
    43  			return false
    44  		}
    45  	}
    46  	return true
    47  }
    48  
    49  // IsDirect determines if the route is direct
    50  func IsDirect(IP net.IP, mask *net.IPMask) bool {
    51  	suffixLength, _ := mask.Size()
    52  	return IsIPv4(IP) && suffixLength == net.IPv4len ||
    53  		len(IP) == net.IPv6len && suffixLength == net.IPv6len
    54  }
    55  
    56  // IsDirectIPNet determines if the IPNET represents a direct route
    57  func IsDirectIPNet(IPNet *net.IPNet) bool {
    58  	if IPNet == nil {
    59  		return false
    60  	}
    61  	return IsDirect(IPNet.IP, &IPNet.Mask)
    62  }
    63  
    64  // IsIPv4 determines if net.IP value is IPv4
    65  func IsIPv4(ip net.IP) (isIPv4 bool) {
    66  	isIPv4 = len(ip.To4()) == net.IPv4len
    67  	return
    68  }
    69  
    70  // IsIPv6 determines if net.IP value is IPv6
    71  func IsIPv6(ip net.IP) (isIPv6 bool) {
    72  	isIPv6 = len(ip.To4()) != net.IPv4len && len(ip) == net.IPv6len
    73  	return
    74  }
    75  
    76  // IsNzIP is ip set and not zero
    77  func IsNzIP(ip net.IP) bool {
    78  	return ip != nil && !ip.IsUnspecified()
    79  }
    80  
    81  // IsBroadcast determines IP is the last address for Mask
    82  // for 1.2.3.4/24 the network address 1.2.3.255 returns true
    83  func IsBroadcast(IP net.IP, IPMask net.IPMask) (isBroadcast bool) {
    84  	if len(IP) != net.IPv4len && len(IP) != net.IPv6len {
    85  		return
    86  	}
    87  	invertedMask := InvertMask(IPMask)
    88  	isBroadcast = IP.Mask(invertedMask).Equal(net.IP(invertedMask))
    89  	return
    90  }
    91  
    92  // InvertMask inverts the bits of a mask
    93  // the mask for 1.2.3.4/24 is normally ffffff00 or []byte{255, 255, 255, 0}
    94  func InvertMask(IPMask net.IPMask) (out net.IPMask) {
    95  	out = make(net.IPMask, len(IPMask))
    96  	for i, b := range IPMask {
    97  		out[i] = ^b
    98  	}
    99  	return
   100  }
   101  
   102  // IPNetString is abbreviated form 0/0
   103  func IPNetString(ipNet net.IPNet) (s string) {
   104  	ones, _ := ipNet.Mask.Size() // the /24 or /32 of CIDR
   105  	s = shorten(ipNet.IP) + "/" + strconv.Itoa(ones)
   106  	return
   107  }
   108  
   109  func shorten(IP net.IP) (s string) {
   110  	s = IP.String()
   111  	if len(IP) != net.IPv4len {
   112  		return
   113  	}
   114  	for strings.HasSuffix(s, zeroSuffix) {
   115  		s = s[:len(s)-len(zeroSuffix)]
   116  	}
   117  	return
   118  }
   119  
   120  // IPAddr returns IPAddr from IP and IfIndex to IPAddr
   121  func IPAddr(IP net.IP, index IfIndex, zone string) (ipa *net.IPAddr, err error) {
   122  	ipa = &net.IPAddr{IP: IP}
   123  	if IsIPv6(IP) {
   124  		if zone != "" {
   125  			ipa.Zone = zone
   126  		} else {
   127  			ipa.Zone, err = index.Zone()
   128  		}
   129  	}
   130  	return
   131  }
   132
